channel.title: Setting a skill limit on a item?
channel.description: I need a code so that when a player reaches 99+ he/she can wear a skill cape. Please help :(

item.title: Setting a skill limit on a item?
item.dc:creator: @PkLite PkLite
item.description:
@PkLite wrote:

Yea. Just change the wear identification to the correct item.

Read full topic

item.title: Setting a skill limit on a item?
item.dc:creator: @zammy1 zammy!!
item.description:
@zammy1 wrote:

if (CLAttack > playerLevel[playerAttack]) { find that above add

			if (wearID == 7626 && playerLevel[6] != 99 ) {
				sendMessage("You need 99 magic for the skillcape NOOB!");
				GoFalse = true;
			}
			if (wearID == 7627 && playerLevel[6] != 99 ) {
				sendMessage("You need 99 magic for the skillcape Hood NOOB!");
				GoFalse = true;
			}
			if (wearID == 7623 && playerLevel[3] != 99 ) {
				sendMessage("You need 99 hp for the skillcape NOOB!");
				GoFalse = true;
			}
			if (wearID == 7624 && playerLevel[3] != 99 ) {
				sendMessage("You need 99 hp for the skillcape Hood NOOB!");
				GoFalse = true;
			}
			if (wearID == 7630 && playerLevel[10] != 99 ) {
				sendMessage("You need 99 fishing for the skillcape NOOB!");
				GoFalse = true;
			}
			if (wearID == 7631 && playerLevel[10] != 99 ) {
				sendMessage("You need 99 fishing for the skillcape Hood NOOB!");
				GoFalse = true;
			}
			if (wearID == 7632 && playerLevel[7] != 99 ) {
				sendMessage("You need 99 cooking for the skillcape NOOB!");
				GoFalse = true;
			}
			if (wearID == 7633 && playerLevel[7] != 99 ) {
				sendMessage("You need 99 cooking for the skillcape Hood NOOB!");
				GoFalse = true;
			}
			if (wearID == 7634 && playerLevel[16] != 99 ) {
				sendMessage("You need 99 agility for the skillcape NOOB!");
				GoFalse = true;
			}
			if (wearID == 7635 && playerLevel[16] != 99 ) {
				sendMessage("You need 99 agility for the skillcape Hood NOOB!");
				GoFalse = true;
			}
			if (wearID == 7636 && playerLevel[2] != 99 ) {
				sendMessage("You need 99 Stength for the skillcape NOOB!");
				GoFalse = true;
			}
			if (wearID == 7637 && playerLevel[2] != 99 ) {
				sendMessage("You need 99 Strength for the skillcape Hood NOOB!");
				GoFalse = true;
			}
			if (wearID == 7685 && playerLevel[11] != 99 ) {
				sendMessage("You need 99 fm for the skillcape NOOB!");
				GoFalse = true;
			}
			if (wearID == 7686 && playerLevel[11] != 99 ) {
				sendMessage("You need 99 fm for the skillcape Hood NOOB!");
				GoFalse = true;
			}

not all of them but some, i assume you mean real skillcapesâ€¦
